page.title: 20Text Pages Authors,Evesham.
page.content:
1.Rachel Scorse; 2.Sally Huxley; 3.Andrew Wyatt; 4.Daniel Curry and Karen Turner; 5.Ben Wooltorton and Sandra Farr; 6.Lynn Rodway; 7.Jake Waterhouse; 8.Sara Coyle; 9.Andrew Wyatt; 10.Jake Waterhouse; 11.Hazel Bees; 12.Geraldine Haken; 13.Roland Rogers; 14.Mark Green; 15.Sally Huxley; 16.Lynn Rodway; 17.Ben Wooltorton; 18.Carol Edwards; 19.'Evesham Standard' & Mr.R.B.Leake;
The children listed above were aged between 8 & 10 yrs in Summer 1985 when the work was done.The writing is based upon one or more of the following: children's experiences, discussion and pupils interviewing adults.We hope that the work will be of interest to you in whatever century you use it. Best wishes from us in 1985 to you, whoever you may be.
